ygData.subject: Changes - My thoughts
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok a few thoughts I came up with over the weekend. I remember that Brian mentioned that we had to do something that would increase the power of the smaller
ygData.messageBody:
Ok a few thoughts I came up with over the weekend. I remember that Brian
mentioned that we had to do something that would increase the power of the
smaller races while not doing anything (or not much) to the larger races.
What about Kick?? It would give the smaller races a nice extra attack
(nothing too much), yet the larger already have an extra so it wouldn't be
anything new to them. I know it's not a lot of damage but anything is nice,
and when you consider that the majority of SK's use 2hs it makes sense
(Since we really can't use Bash - Especially in group situations where you
have to kill the Mob quickly).

Also do NOT give us a lifetap. They are slow and useless, if you have ever
seen a necro cast one you know what I'm talking about. Considering how far
down the Necro spell list we are the ones we would be given would be
completely useless to us. I would much rather see spells like Poison,
Infectious Cloud, Addtl Shields and Cure Disease.

Anyway, just some thoughts..

Thomas
